title: RENOVATED 3/2.5 TOWNHOUSE/AC/WASHER&DRYER INSIDE/ATTACHED 2 CAR GARAGE
posting_body: Renovated 3/2.5 TOWNHOUSE is for rent in a beautiful, gated community, in a centrally located area of TARZANA.
This two-story corner unit is complete with an ATTACHED, TWO CAR GARAGE, WASHER & DRYER INSIDE and central air conditioning.
A living room has a gas fireplace and opens directly to the outdoor patio.
The kitchen has a built in microwave, a dishwasher, a double door refrigerator, and a convenient pass thru to the dining area, perfect for entertaining.
The main level also has a separate pantry by the kitchen, a half bathroom, plus a storage nook under the stairs and direct access to the garage with plenty of storage space.
The primary bedroom includes en suite bathroom with Jacuzzi tub.
Both additional bedrooms are spacious in size, with double paned second floor safety windows.
The second bathroom upstairs has a double sinks, separate from the shower tub combo.
The HOA maintains grounds with lush landscaping, pool, spa, sport court and clubhouse.
